title: Vyacheslav Ryabov
text:
Vyacheslav Ryabov (; born 21 June 1989) is a <a href="professional">professional</a> Ukrainian <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who plays for <a href="FC%20Kryvbas%20Kryvyi%20Rih%20%282020%29">Kryvbas Kryvyi Rih</a>.
Career.
Born in <a href="Kryvyi%20Rih">Kryvyi Rih</a>, <a href="Dnipropetrovsk%20Oblast">Dnipropetrovsk Oblast</a>, <a href="Ukrainian%20SSR">Ukrainian SSR</a>, Ryabov is a product of his native FC Kryvbas Kryvyi Rih Youth Sportive School. 
He signed contract with FC Kryvbas in 2007, but made only one appearance in the <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a>, as substituted player in the game against <a href="FC%20Dnipro%20Dnipropetrovsk">FC Dnipro Dnipropetrovsk</a> on 16 May 2009. Then he played for football clubs in the <a href="Ukrainian%20Second%20League">Ukrainian Second League</a> or in the <a href="Ukrainian%20First%20League">Ukrainian First League</a>.
